correct: [always false in this experiment] correct (true) or incorrect (false) response
keys: the counterbalanced response keys, where first is common and second is rare
key: [training] the correct key for the current stimulus
trial: the number of the current trial within phase
include: whether to include trial in final data set
trial_type: the JSPsych plugin used to run the trial
trial_index: The index of the current trial component across the whole experiment
time_elapsed: The number of milliseconds since the start of the experiment when the trial ended
abresp: the abstract response converted from key_press (common, rare, none)
